backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking Valentine’s site requirements to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text list summarizing each frontend file’s purpose for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining Valentine-themed color tokens, dark mode, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading fonts and mounting the React root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the single-page Valentine layout.
frontend/src/components/HeartsBackground: Floating hearts animation component generating randomized heart SVG positions.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Central content configuration storing all text, images, and section data for the Valentine site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication hook and provider implementing Internet Identity login, state management, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom Valentine-themed color variables, dark mode variants, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineSinglePage.t: Renders the full Valentine page layout by composing multiple themed sections.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Displays a themed footer with branding, animated heart icon, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/sections/GallerySection.tsx: Shows a responsive image gallery using content-driven items with hover effects.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the hero banner with animated text, hearts background, and CTA scroll button.
Displays a handwritten-style love letter with a hearts background and pastel styling.
frontend/src/sections/OurStorySection.ts: Shows the couple’s story and a timeline using cards styled with Valentine colors.
frontend/src/sections/ReasonsILoveYouSec: Lists reasons dynamically and allows users to add new entries via input and cards.
frontend/src/sections/SpecialSurpriseSec: Provides a revealable surprise message and optional music playback controls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended Valentine color variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project configuration and aesthetic guidelines for a Valentine’s Day single-page website, including required images and existing feature definitions. Contains architectural notes and no known issues.
